attributes.action: Create an independent body to which the Football Association of England will be accountable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current English Football Association is not accountable to anyone who stands to safeguard the interest of fans and the national game. The FA should be comprised of appointed and democratically elected counsellors with fixed terms. All major decsions should be subject to an independent review by a body with the power to dismiss counsellors should the need arise. 

Football as a sport in this country represents a huge amount to many millions of hard working fans. It is time the government put structures in place to ensure their interests are guarded.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
